name: A-List Marketing
slogan: A nano-influencer marketing platform that connects local businesses with local influencers
description:
A-List is creating a highly automated digital platform where local brands/businesses such as restaurants, bars, nightclubs, salons, etc and nano-influencers (customers who love the business/brand) can find each other and carry out mutually beneficial campaigns.  

For years, many great ideas, people, products/services, and businesses have gone by unrewarded whilst having exceptional potential. It is often because these companies never truly mastered the science behind how to get people, who love their products, to talk about it, and share the message to attract more people, more attention, and more revenue. While other big businesses can often depend on their huge financial resources to get the name out, many start-ups and SMEs with limited resources remain under the radar, struggling to get the recognition they deserve. A-List Marketing exists for the sole purpose of making these great ideas/businesses/people truly great in the eyes of the world and get them the glory that their dedication and skill merits.

team.name: Aman Kulthia
team.bioHtml: Founder of A-List Marketing | Founded Bad Men (Online dropshipping store) | Founding Intern for Wintern Ltd | Event Manager for Nightclubs | Business Developer

jobs.title: Chief Technical Officer
jobs.description:
*Personal note: We are looking for a co-founder who is willing to take a leap of faith in us and our mission. We want you to be fully committed and believe in this project as much as we do. It's going to be a long journey but we can promise you, it will be one hell of a ride.*

We are seeking a highly skilled CTO with a storied history or experience in the technological development sector. CTO will tasked with making executive technology decisions on behalf of the company, including managing a technology budget and making investments to align the company with their vision for its technological needs. You should be a strategic thinker, an effective communicator and an expert in technological development.

You will work directly with the CEO and will act as both a technology and business expert,having great authority making decisions that will impact the current and future operations of the company. 

**CTO Responsibilities:**
Create a digital marketing platform application for users to:
		*Create detailed user profiles with a dashboard
		*Influencers find brand campaigns that they can apply for and join
		*Brands can list their application requirement and create campaign tasks 
		*Brands can review and select infleuncers they would like to work for them
		*App can track the engagement achieved by influencers completing the tasks and        automates the reward they ll get based on engagement
		*Influencers can track and be automatically compensated for their tasks completed 
    * A control panel whereby brands can track the progress of their live campaigns and analyze results.		
		
**Aditional Responsibilities**		
* Setting a vision for how technology will be developed and used for the operational purposes.
* Ensuring that the technological design and ability meet the company's short and long-term needs.
* Outline the goals for research and development.
* Create and manage timelines for the development and deployment of all technological products and services
* Making executive decisions on behalf of the company's technological requirements.
* Act as a mentor to team members.
* Maintain a consumer-focused outlook 
* Staying on top of technology trends and developments.
* Ensuring all technology practices adhere to regulatory standards.

Personal note: We are looking for a co-founder who is willing to take a leap of faith in us and our mission. We want you to be fully committed and believe in this project as much as we do. It's going to be a long journey but we can promise you, it will be one hell of a ride.

You will work directly with the CEO and will act as both a technology and business expert,having great authority making decisions that will impact the current and future operations of the company.

CTO Responsibilities:

*Create detailed user profiles with a dashboard
*Influencers find brand campaigns that they can apply for and join

*Brands can review and select infleuncers they would like to work for them
*App can track the engagement achieved by influencers completing the tasks and automates the reward they ll get based on engagement
*Influencers can track and be automatically compensated for their tasks completed
* A control panel whereby brands can track the progress of their live campaigns and analyze results.

Aditional Responsibilities

  • Setting a vision for how technology will be developed and used for the operational purposes.
  • Ensuring that the technological design and ability meet the company's short and long-term needs.
  • Outline the goals for research and development.
  • Create and manage timelines for the development and deployment of all technological products and services

  • Act as a mentor to team members.
  • Maintain a consumer-focused outlook
  • Staying on top of technology trends and developments.
  • Ensuring all technology practices adhere to regulatory standards.
